advancements.tradefair.root.title: Tradefair
advancements.tradefair.take_census.title: Spotted off the port bow
advancements.tradefair.take_census.descr: Take count of landlubbers in yer crew with a Loderock
advancements.tradefair.trade_max.title: Yer alright, landlubber
advancements.tradefair.trade_max.descrip: Sell yer precious gold to a landlubber with some sense!
